snippet: If Northwestern beats Mississippi State in the Gator Bowl, it will have ended a nine-game skid in bowls, and Coach Pat Fitzgerald will have more wins than any of his predecessors.
abstract: Profile of Northwestern University football coach Pat Fitzgerald, whose job has become building a Big Ten power; Wildcats will meet Mississippi State in the Gator Bowl on New Year's Day, their fifth straight bowl appearance.
lead_paragraph: If Northwestern beats Mississippi State in the Gator Bowl, it will have ended a nine-game skid in bowls, and Coach Pat Fitzgerald will have more wins than any of his predecessors.

headline.seo: Fitzgerald and Northwestern Hope to End Bowl Losing Streak
headline.main: Pursuing a First Win in the Bowls Since 1949
headline.print_headline:
Coaching Northwestern
From Cellar to Credibility
